name: Getoutaga
description:
Getoutaga is a small  Arcade Shooter inspired by games like Space Invaders and Galaga.

Shoot down enemies to get the High-Score and use tape to both hold them in place and repair your surroundings. Once the game border is broken, fly out and take the fight on your own terms! No need to be confined to old 4:3 standards in this modern 16:9 World.

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS - Move Ship
Z- Shoot
X - Fire Tape

Getoutaga was created using Godot 4 for the  Mini Jame Gam #16. Fonts Used are DogicaPixel and Game Of Squids, all other assets were made by me.
